enable-shortcut-desc: Use keyboard shortcut to quickly open the app
shortcut-input-desc: Click 'Record' button then press key combination
shortcut-need-modifier: Shortcut needs to include at least one of Ctrl or Alt
shortcut-need-modifier-macos: Shortcut needs to include at least one of Control, Option or Command
shortcut-taken: This shortcut is already taken by another application
enable-auto-launch-desc: Run Launcher automatically when system starts
auto-launch-update-failed: Failed to update auto start settings
open-storage-desc: View application data files in folder
app-desc: A tool to quickly access frequently used files, folders, URLs, and commands
dev-tools-tip: Press F12 to open Chrome Developer Tools
confirm-clear-data: Are you sure you want to remove all records? This action cannot be undone.
command-tip: To execute multi-line commands, write them to a script file and execute it
enter-path-required: Please enter a path or command
select-file-failed: Failed to select file, please try again
select-folder-failed: Failed to select folder, please try again
empty-list: Click + button to add new items
